title: Why are players who speak like this not banned?
body:
I recently had an encounter with this player after my ranked game, who constantly told me to kill myself even though i didn't speak to him all game. 
What makes these players so angry? he added me after the game to speak a little more of his mind.

He also ended the conversation with "K cya n******" then removed me before i could wish him luck.
 {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
